property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Septon of the Shadows is discarded from your hand, from your deck, or from play, kneel 2 influence or kneel a Holy character to shuffle it back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a card is placed at the bottom of your deck, kneel Unorthodox Priest to move that card to the top of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army,House Tyrell,

property.value: After you win a challenge in which Wardens of the Reach participated, choose 2 characters. Move all power from one of those characters to the other.

property.value: No attachments,,

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you declare attackers during an intrigue challenge, kneel Decadent Brothel to choose a character. That character must be declared as a defender during this challenge, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: All gold penalties are increased by 1. [+1 INFLUENCE]

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the dominance phase, each player must choose and return to hand a character he or she controls, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 4 influence and 2 House Tyrell characters to return all House Tyrell cards in your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Stark only. Dominance: If no opponent has declared a military challenge against you this round, choose a unique Stark character in your discard pile, and put that character into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Any phase: Until the end of the phase, players cannot trigger effects or abilities unless they kneel 2 influence in addition to all other costs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel X influence to choose an attacking or defending character without an intrigue icon with STR X or lower. Remove that character from the challenge. If that character is standing, kneel it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose an attacking Dothraki character. For the duration of the challenge, that character gets +1 STR. Then, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Response: Kneel 2 influence to cancel the effects of an event card with a single target. Then, copy the effects of that event choosing a new target.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Kneel 1 influence to stand a character that was knelt this phase to pay the cost of an event or triggered ability. Then, put Endless Ambition on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Put a Stark character from your discard or dead pile into play. That character cannot be declared as an attacker. At the end of the phase, if that character is in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Lannister only. Dominance: Choose an attachment in play. Put that attachment on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Until the end of the phase, if a player would discard 1 or more cards from his or her hand, instead put them on top of his or her deck in the order of your choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Discard Holding Tactics from your hand. Response: After Holding Tactics is discarded from your hand, shuffle it and the next 2 cards in your discard pile back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a Noble character. If that character has 1 or more power on it, stand it. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Lannister only. Any phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose 2 House Tyrell cards. Stand or kneel those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: If you have 7 or more cards in your hand, you may declare an additional challenge of your choice this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Martell only. Any phase: Choose a player. Until the end of the phase, that player cannot play event cards.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council,,

property.name: Text
property.value: Put to the Question cannot be cancelled. Response: Cancel a triggered effect that chooses a unique character or location with at least 1 House affiliation as a target.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a Greyjoy character. Until the end of the phase, that character does not kneel to attack or defend during military and power challenges.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Lannister only. Any phase: Kneel 1 influence to choose 1 kneeling and 1 standing character, both controlled by the same player. Kneel one of those characters, and stand the other.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Until the end of the phase, Holy characters gain 'Response: Kneel this character to save a character from being killed. Then draw a card.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Choose a card type: character, location, or attachment. Players with fewer cards in hand than you pay a +1 gold penalty on the chosen card type until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Lannister only. Response: After you win an intrigue challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose and kill a non-House Tyrell character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a Noble character to choose an opponent. Until the end of the phase, draw a card each time a card is discarded from that opponent's hand or deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Targaryen only. Marshalling: Ignore all gold penalties on the next card you play this phase. If that card would have been played with a gold penalty, reduce its cost by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose an attacking character you control during an intrigue challenge. Until the end of the phase that character gains stealth. If you win the challenge by 4 or more total STR, you may change the effect of winning the challenge to that of a military or power challenge.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell,,

property.name: Text
property.value: House Baratheon or House Lannister only. Any Phase: Kneel X influence to choose any number of characters with combined STR X or lower. Until the end of the phase, those characters cannot attack, defend, or kneel to pay for or trigger effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: A player cannot declare a military or power challenge unless he or she has won an intrigue challenge that phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Tyrell characters are immune to triggered effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a neutral or in-House, non-unique Weapon attachment and attach it to a character you control, if able. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the challenge phase, each player chooses up to 3 characters that he or she controls. All characters not chosen are discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, look at each opponent's hand. Then choose a card from each of those hands and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cards in each opponent's dead pile and discard pile cannot move from those piles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be cancelled. When revealed, place all characters, locations, and attachments you control at the bottom of their owners' decks, in any order.
